title: 2 BR+living room 1 BA, view, w/d, FIDI, Parking
posting_body: this 2 bedrooms 1 bath is corner unit, sunny and bright
Unit facing the street, has view of downtown.
Separate living room, good for sharing.
Ceiling  height at 9 feet, every single room with large windows.
A large kitchen with room for a table.
Shower over tub.
Walking distant to Financial district, Downtown & Chinatown.
One block from Columbus street  and few block from Washington Square.
Lots of great restaurant, café, bars and stores.
Step to Chinatown (all kinds of stores, cheap and fresh produce and meats)
Near several bus line (bus # 30, 15, 12, 41 & 45)
1 Year lease required.
Rent controlled apartment.
Parking: parking available for 2 car tandem for additional fee
Utilities:  garbage.
Laundry facilities in the building.
To apply please bring the following to the showing:
- Recent credit report with scores
- 2 recent pay stubs or job offer letter.
- Copy of photo ID.
